title: Paradise on river Danube
content:
Need a break between the matches?

Relax and go for a walk to Margitsziget (Margaret Island) where you will find both peace and entertaining activities. Nature dominates the nearly 3 kilometres long island, but you can also have fun at the Palatinus bath or just sit down near one of the beautiful fountains.

Did you know?

There's a well known Hungarian band called Margaret Island as well
